name: list_transactions
description: List all recent transactions in the QuantumEncryptionNetwork.

name: decrypt_transaction
description: Decrypt a specific transaction to view its contents.

transaction_id.description: The ID of the transaction to decrypt.

name: create_protocol
description: This tool is intended to help design new communication protocols based on provided security and efficiency requirements.

requirements.description: Detailed description of the security and efficiency needs for the protocol. Specific algorithms and key lengths can be requested here.

name: list_nodes
description: List all nodes in the Quantum Encryption Network along with their capabilities.

name: generate_encryption_certificate
description: Generate a new encryption certificate to replace an expired or compromised one.

node_id.description: The ID of the network node to generate a new certificate for.

name: list_routing_paths
description: List all available routing paths in the network.

name: modify_routing_path
description: Modify or remove specific routing paths in the network.

path_id.description: The ID of the routing path to be modified.

action.description: The action to be taken on the path, such as 'disable', 'enable', or 'delete'.
